channel.title: Linear Regression on Datumorphism
channel.description: Recent content in Linear Regression on Datumorphism

item.title: Linear Regression
item.description: In this article, we will use the Einstein summation convention. For example, $$ X_{ij}\beta_ j $$ is equivalent to $$ \sum_j X_{ij}\beta_ j $$ In statistics, we have at least three categories of quantities: data and labels abstract theoretical quantities parameters and predictions of models The convention is that quantities with $\hat {}$ are the model quantities. Sometimes we do not distinguish the abstract theoretical quantities and model quantities.
